---
title: Wikiapp Docs
---

Welcome to the documentation for Wikiapp! We are so glad you here.

This library will let you get random wikipedia page excerpts, in any language.

Yeah we know it does not do much! But it is a start.

```bash
❯ wikiapp
Waimārama
Waimārama is a seaside village in Hastings District, Hawke's Bay, New
Zealand.

❯ wikiapp --language fr
Changement démocratique (Salvador)
Le Changement démocratique est un parti politique salvadorien fondé en
2005. Il est membre de la COPPPAL. Portail de la politique   Portail
du Salvador

❯ wikiapp -l es
Santa Bárbara (Salta)
Santa Bárbara es un pequeño paraje rural ubicado sobre la RN 40 en el
departamento Cafayate, provincia de Salta, Argentina.

```
